name: Ashar

projects.title: Sheska
projects.description: Sheska is an online fintech platform that makes hosting events easier, more integrated, and cheaper. It hosts seamless guest integration experiences that allow guests to learn about, fund, and experience your event in a one-of-a-kind way. It also allows customers to find vendors on the platform who meet their needs, it handles payments, vendor integrations, and more. Built in React, TailwindCSS, on Serverless Google Cloud Infastructure

projects.title: Local
projects.description: Local makes it easier to find things to do. Built in React native with Expo on both IOS and Android

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara: Computer science professional Interested in building things that make people delighted.
